Package mainPackage

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • mainPackage.Game
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InitGame

    public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
implements InitGame
    Main class of the game. It calls every other elements, and defines the initial conditions of the game.
    Author:
    Benjamin Héroult

      • getInstance

        public static final Game getInstance​()

      • createPlayers

        public void createPlayers​(int number,
                          int difficultyCoefficient)
        Creates "number" less 1 instance(s) of AI(s)
        Parameters:
        number - total number of players
        difficultyCoefficient - number representing the difficulty level

      • distribCards

        public void distribCards​(int nb_jeux)
        Distributes cards to the different players. It requires the method cardPerplayer from the class Rule to determines how many cards must be distributed to each player.
        Parameters:
        nb_jeux - number of decks (1 or 2, witch means 52 or 104 cards in the game)

      • getPlayersName

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getPlayersName​()

      • chooseDifficulty

        public Strategy chooseDifficulty​(int difficultyCoefficient)
        Choose the difficulty level using the answer communicated by the user, and define the strategy the AIs will use.
        Parameters:
        difficultyCoefficient - level of difficulty for the game (1 for easy, 2 for hard)
        Returns:
        return the strategy the AIs will use
